json.jl

In this file there are some functions to read infos from the json potree file.

Main Interface

Potree.json2volume — Function

json2volume(path::String)

Read a file .json of volume model.

Example of a volume file json structure.

{
   "clip":true,
   "name":"name",
   "scale":{
      "x":1.,
      "y":1.,
      "z":1.
   },
   "position":{
   	  "x":0.,
	  "y":0.,
	  "z":0.
   },
   "rotation":{
      "x":0.,
      "y":0.,
      "z":0.
   },
   "permitExtraction":true
}
source
Potree.json2LARvolume — Function
json2LARvolume(path::String)

Return LAR model of Potree volume tools.

source
Potree.seedPointsFromFile — Function

measure JSON from Potree 1.7
